title: New, bigger Stashers Cargo Bag handlebar pouch carries cameras & cold drinks
content:
Stashers has been making insulated bags for years, helping you strap beers (or sodas, seltzers, or gear) all over your bike. Now, their new Cargo Bag adds a little girth to help you bring bigger bottlesâ€¦or your DSLR. And you can do it all without any leaks or creaks thanks to a waterproof liner and

The post New, bigger Stashers Cargo Bag handlebar pouch carries cameras & cold drinks appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
